content:
This thread is dedicated to hosting the video recordings of the conference talks.

Please subscribe to the ItaLean YouTube channel to receive notifications as new recordings are published.
Do you have an estimate of when the videos will be published?
The videos should be ready in a week or two.

Hi everyone, I will publish all the videos within the next few hours.

Apologies for the delay! A few technical issues came up and took longer than expected to resolve. :man_facepalming:.
